title: Utkarsh
text:
Hello! I’m Utkarsh, a Machine Learning engineer and sports analyst with a focus on cricket. As a polyglot programmer, I code mostly in Python with a growing interest in C, Golang, and Rust. When I’m not crunching data or writing code, you can find me following sports like cricket, hockey, MMA, and NFL, or exploring the world of movies.



Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
University of Technology, City, Country
Graduated: May 2022

Relevant Coursework: Data Structures, Web Development, Database Management, Software Engineering
Honors: Dean’s List (2020-2022), Graduated with Distinction




Web Developer Intern
Tech Solutions Inc., City, Country
June 2022 - Present

Collaborated with a team of developers to design and implement responsive web applications.
Assisted in debugging and troubleshooting issues in existing applications.
Participated in code reviews to ensure code quality and best practices.

Freelance Web Developer
Self-Employed
January 2021 - May 2022

Developed custom websites for small businesses, focusing on user experience and SEO.
Managed client communications and project timelines to ensure timely delivery.
Utilized HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and various frameworks to create dynamic web applications.
